column6: -When the world is about to end, do you still keep fighting? -From the moment Kamala put on her costume, she's been challenged, but nothing has prepared her for this:  the Last Days of the Marvel Universe.   -Fists up, let's do this, Jersey City. -Plus a VERY special guest appearance fans have been clamoring for!
column8: | artist:Adrian Alphona | penciller (cover):Kris Anka | writer:G. Willow Wilson
